presentation.title: Hi, I'm Antoine

home.welcome-to-my-portfolio:
Welcome to my portfolio!
Here you will be able to learn more about me and my projects.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: I am currently a 5th year student at Epitech and I am passionate about software development. I have experience in a wide range of technologies and programming languages. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: I have worked on a variety of projects, including web applications, mobile applications, and games. I am always looking for new projects to work on, so if you have an idea for a project, feel free to reach out to me!

about.title: About
about.introduction: Hi! My name is Antoine and I am a Full-stack and Mobile Developer based in Lille, France. I am currently a 5th year student at Epitech, where I am preparing to graduate as a Software Engineer Expert. I am passionate about software development and I have experience in a wide range of technologies and programming languages. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a developer.

messages.content: My name is Antoine, I'm a student in Lille (🇫🇷)
What and where do you study?
I'm currently a 5th year student at Epitech Lille, preparing to graduate as a Software Engineer Expert.
Sounds cool! What are your skills?
I'm passionate about Mobile, Full Stack, Front-end, Back-end development and UI/UX Design.
Nice! What kind of projects have you worked on?
I have worked on a variety of projects, including web applications, mobile applications, and games.
I'm always looking for new challenges, so if you have a project idea, feel free to reach out!
Okay thank you! What are your career goals?
I want to work in an innovative and dynamic company, where I can continue to learn and grow as a developer.
Do you have any hobbies appart from coding?
Yes, I enjoy music, sport and playing video games. I also like to travel and discover new places.
How can I get in touch with you?
You can simply answer this message or check out my 'Contact' page for more information.
I would be pleased to discuss with you!

tech-stack.title: Technical stack
tech-stack.description: Here are some of the technologies and programming languages that I have experience with:

list.title: Portfolio
list.description: This is my latest project: the website you are currently browsing. I designed and developed this portfolio to showcase my skills and projects.

list.title: Popsell
list.description: Popsell is a social commerce SaaS company that works with brands like Histoire d'Or. During my internship as a front-end developer, I worked on migrating the company's back-office from Vue.js 2 to Vue.js 3. I also participated in the redesign of the user interface and the addition of new features.

list.title: Aizy
list.description: Aizy is the final project I completed with six other students. It is a trading bot marketplace, specifically, it is a web application that allows users to create, test, and rent out trading bots. I worked on the back-end of the application.

list.title: YogaMarine
list.description: YogaMarine is a website designed for a private yoga teacher. I took the time to understand her needs and expectations in order to offer her a website that suits her. She sent me a mockup of the site that I then improved before integrating it.
details: Improving and integrating the client-provided mockup

list.title: R-Type
list.description: R-Type is a project I developed during my third year at Epitech. It is a 2D side-scrolling shoot 'em up game inspired by the classic arcade game of the same name. I worked on the game engine, the game logic, the game design and did all the multi-threaded server.

list.title: Area
list.description: The Area is a project I developed during my third year at Epitech. It is a web application, a mobile application, and a server that allow users to create automation scenarios by connecting services together via APIs, similar to IFTTT. I worked on the mobile application and the server.

list.title: Zôdio
list.description: Zôdio is a retail chain specializing in home decoration and creative hobbies. I completed my second-year internship at Zôdio, where I worked on developing a mobile application for store employees. I was able to make updates to the application, fix bugs, and add new features such as support for electronic shelf labels in stores. This required me to contact the company that supplied these labels to obtain their API documentation and integrate it into the application.
